architectural_notes: Treat the user-provided photo as immutable; do not crop, resize, filter, compress, or otherwise alter it.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wide group photo on an outdoor sports field (hr-academy-1-2-uploaded.dim_1280x360.jpeg)

existing_features.title: Add the uploaded image file "HR Academy 1-2.jpeg" to the frontend static assets at frontend/public/assets/generated/ and ensure it is stored and served exactly as provided (no resizing, recompression, cropping, filters, metadata stripping, format conversion, or other modifications).

Update the Home page Mission section ("Our Mission" on the / route) to display the uploaded photo exactly as-is using a direct reference to the copied static asset, and remove any styling that visually alters the image (including but not limited to rounded corners/clipping, overlays, opacity, CSS filters, or object-fit cropping).

new_feature_requests.summary: Use the provided photo exactly as-is (no changes or alterations) in the app/build

projectName: Use uploaded photo exactly as-is in Home “Our Mission” section
